name: Holiday Camper
info:
Made in 2013, economical 2L engine. 6 seats, 5 beds; navigation.
Kitchen, oven (3 flames), fridge with a freezer; Stand-alone air cooler and gas heating;
A shower and a toilet,hot and cold water;
An extendable roof, 4 bike holders; A set of camping furniture.
Camper delivery by order can be arranged.
